alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 06 at 8:24AM EDT until April 06 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Suffolk County on Long Island, most of southern Connecticut, and northern Westchester counties in interior southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog in Westchester and Putnam counties may lift before 10 AM. Farther south and east, the dense fog should lift in most places between 10 and 11 AM.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your fog lamps or low beam headlights, and leave plenty of braking distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
